entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • sendpacketselement_filestreamwithoptions_success fails with timeout #63523
  • sendpacketselement_filestreamlargeoffset_throws fails with timeout #63522
  • sendpacketselement_filestreammultipartmixed_multiplefilestreams_success fails #63521
  • Avoid global:: qualifying all names in the Regex source generator #63512
    7.0.0
  • Allow configuration binding to set-only properties #63508
  • Build x64/arm64 cross-architecture DAC for Linux #63506
    7.0.0
  • What is the purpose of hashing in a PDB Document? #63505
  • Move Regex source generator generated helper methods to a shared class #63502
    7.0.0
  • JIT should vectorize zeroing constant stackalloc-s #63500
  • VN does not number some HWI loads properly #63499
    7.0.0
  • interface like mono_domain_create_appdomain is declared but there is no implemention. #63494
    7.0.0
  • Normalize `Vector64/Vector128.Create(0)/Create(0,0, ..)` to `Vector64/Vector128.Zero` #63490
  • Find a way to get data from embedded resource without reflection #63488
  • Test failure System.Tests.GCExtendedTests.GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread(size: 1000) #63487

Closed

  • code-generator: loop-invariant expressions left within loop blocks #63516
  • SocketsHttpHandler: Improve handling of failed connection attempts #60654
    7.0.0
  • User Secrets not loading Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting 6.0 #63246
    6.0.x
  • Vector.Narrow performance #9766
    Future
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Tests.EncryptingAndDecryptingAsymmetric.AsymmetricEncryptionRoundtripUseOAEP #62827
  • Net 6.0 assembly dynamic loading and (un)/reloading not possible anymore? #63509
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not ignore delegate properties #62354
    6.0.x
  • Subsequent Grpc calls with WinHttpHandler to an IIS hosted service fail #60291
    6.0.x
  • Different behavior of ECDsa.ExportParameters between .NET 4.8 and .NET [Core] #62813
  • Crash on WindowsCryptographicException on net60 GA #61417
  • [API Proposal]: Add a SHA-256 Thumbprint convenience property to X509Certificate2 #62425
  • CultureNotFoundException in Net6 but works in Net5 on same system #62929
    7.0.0
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler token expiration date validation fails if date more than 25 years #63001
  • Issue with HexEncoder #61047
  • Make KeyDerivationAlgorithm a primitive #17655
    Future
  • `HttpClient.SendAsync(...)` may fail to return response that's returned by server prior to completion of sending full request. #57186
    Future
  • Options pattern does not work if I initialize the IEnumerable type model #63083
  • [Proposal]: [String.SplitAsSpan] #63497
  • JIT cannot devirtualize interface call in trivial cases #63283
  • Linux Docker Container #63094
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests failing on windows #52843
    7.0.0
  • Inter-process Mutex doesn't work for processes of different architectures on Apple Silicon #62140
    6.0.x
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeEndEntityWithExpiredRevocation #63486

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63520
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63519
    area-Single-File
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fixes Event Log Message Format on Unmanaged FailFast #63517
    community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Fix step on ios when using interpreter #63515
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63514
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [draft] hot reload wip #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Move localloc/common library under JIT folder #63510
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Draft][Perf] Enable LLVM on perf runs #63504
    area-Infrastructure
  • [debugger] Fix reading a byte without checking the version of the Protocol #63503
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in JSON src-gen'd code #63501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Add more automated test coverage for the wasm bindings as prep for custom marshalers #63498
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/6.0] Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values (#62798) #63493
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Port test-only test fixes #63507
    area-Meta
  • Show test names in merged wrapper execution log #63511
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63431
    arch-arm32, area-Single-File, 6.0.x
  • Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63472
    area-System.Text.Json
  • HttpConnectionPool improvements #62935
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Move init-vs-env in test build script down #63433
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62350
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 5.0.x
  • Clarify P/Invoke shims guidance for OOB assemblies #63470
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update coverlet and reportgenerator versions #63491
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63495
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp version to 4.0.1 #63492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62769
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Ensure UserSecretsIdAttribute is added to assembly #63423
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.2
  • Bump SdkVersionForWorkloadTesting to use a 200 band SDK #63450
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Creating Cultures with Sort Names #63386
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62916
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62922
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #63346
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Sign ILVerification.dll #63471
    area-ILVerification
  • Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in JSON src-gen'd code #63496
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Support for specifying max depth of generic cycle #63435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Test][Revert] Reverted change to global build job #63483
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • Improve use of {Last}IndexOf{Any} in Regex loops #63428
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1541995 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • improve TLS resume on server #63030
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Fix Fiji time zone time conversion #63476
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][tests] Fix, and simplify sample building on CI #63429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make it easier to enable FEATURE_AUTO_TRACE #63478
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63482
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #63454
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: rework logic for when OSR imports method entry #63406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Reduce buffer size used in XmlReader when using Async mode #63459
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Disable MemoryMappedFileTests failing on macOS/arm64 + coreclr due to too long path #63438
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6 CLI Issues - dotnet new --list or dotnet new JSON error / VS project templates #23320
  • Make API Compat check for cases where compiler emits references to internal modreq's in methods #23319
  • Solved by install this update from WU catalog: #23314
  • .NET6 - MSB4236: The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found #23311

Closed

  • [API Compat] Pin Microsoft.CodeAnalysis dependency to 4.0.0 once it ships #22090
    7.0.1xx
  • `dotnet watch run` does not read `appsettings.Development.json` when `--project` is used #23183
  • "dotnet build --no-restore" restores all dependencies #23279

PullRequests

Created

  • Update old preview aka.ms link #23324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542031 #23323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ #23318
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add an option to run dotnet-watch in non-interactive mode #23309
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Catch dotnet watch task cancellation after `CTRL+C` #23316
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update runHelixAndNonHelixInParallel.ps1 #23284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pin Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version for API Compat to the 4.0.x stable package. #23321
    Area-Compatibility

Updated

  • Add the same condition we have for net 6 to net 7 #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • I noticed that another test handled this better so cleaning up the test code. #23231
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0161 Code Fix Deleting Content #58726
  • Many compiler tests are flaky under Linux Environment #58719
  • Implicit cast between type and function pointer #58718
  • Options master plan #58717
    Backlog
  • A possible easy solution to not build docs-only changes on CI #58710
  • IDE0044 or CS0266 - sbyte assignment via ternary operator and integer literal leaves you with no choice #58709
  • Add FAR test coverage for UI rendering #58706
  • SymbolDisplay.FormatPrimitive(object, bool, bool) does not handle some expected cases correctly #58705
  • [LSP] Go to Definition doesn't support source link (or decompilation) #58702
    Backlog
  • Support converting more ?? expressions to parameter null checks #58699
    17.2

Closed

  • [Proposal] GetAllTypesByMetadataName #57802
    17.1
  • Some optimizations about queries. #58692
  • Revisit FileTextLoaderOptions.FileLengthThreshold #58553
    17.2
  • Roslyn analyzer suggestion to convert a switch statement to switch expression alters runtime code behavior #58636
    17.2.P1
  • Double click inline adornment to insert text into document #55519
    17.1
  • __arglist should not be allowed to have a default value #58672
    17.2
  • foreach should prompt "{ }" for autocomplete #58685
  • Implementation of extension method causes ArgumentOutOfRangeException #58074
  • [LSP] Consider storing syntax trees with document text for opened documents #57020
    17.1
  • [LSP] Use LSP project contexts in classic VS scenarios #54450
    17.1
  • Find All References is not rendering correctly #58693
  • Pulling member up does not copy documentation #57230
    17.1
  • Provide a shortcut for navigation to base types #57236
    17.1
  • code formatting: align on equal sign, after comma... #58680

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor simplification in EnC #58728
    Area-Interactive
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid allocations for .globalconfig parsing when possible #58725
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove implicit conversion from string to `ReadOnlySpan<T>` from test source for `ReadOnlySpan<T>`. #58724
    Area-Compilers, Test-Scenario
  • Don't run CI for docs-only changes #58723
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Force the spill sequence rewriter to spill the receiver for interpolated string handlers #58722
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1541625 #58721
  • Avoid cyclic references during incremental project update #58720
    Area-IDE
  • Fix usernames in area-owners.md [features/dont-build-docs-changes] #58716
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #58713
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't crash when default namespace isn't a valid name #58704
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58703
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Null annotate ParameterSymbol and derived #58700
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Deduplicate references in CommandLineProject.CreateProjectInfo #58701
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move suggestion mode configuration to state reset service #58656
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't run CI for docs-only changes #58712
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58714
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58715
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement GetTypesByMetadataName #58366
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints, Next
  • Fix a few param-nullchecking parsing bugs #58644
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Param Null Checking
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58707
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58708
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Insert casts to ensure that runtime types (And values) are not impacted when converting switch to expression #58694
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix MemoryExtensions.TrimStart #58587
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58697
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58695
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58729
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers, Feature - Param Null Checking
  • Remove contract check to avoid crash #58675
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • SpillSequenceSpiller.Spill - ensure sequences under ref assignments are spilled. #58657
    Area-Compilers
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename Basic to Visual Basic in Visual Studio options page #53134
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Required modifier parsing #58431
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Fix code generation to add default constraint when needed #53318
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Add GlassTestsHotReloadService external access #58456
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Identity: Message for invalid username does not reflect actual permitted characters. #39375
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Use different calender and format info for DateTime.ToString() and DateTime.Parse() #39373
  • .NET 6 Blazor server app not Disposing razor pages on browser tab close #39370
  • Perf improvement: json_netty #39368
  • Go back to Windows.11.Amd64.ClientPre.Open #39363

Closed

  • dotnet watch: Ctrl-C doesn't reset the terminal echo on Mac #37047
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `dotnet watch run` throws AFTER CTRL-C #37113
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39010
    7.0-preview1
  • "AspNetCore.OpenIdConnect.Nonce" and "AspNetCore.Correlation" cookies unable to set cookie as Session cookies #39351
  • Perf regression: caching #39369
  • Wildcard in launchSettings.json causes "The hostname could not be parsed." #39366
  • [BindNeverAttribute] is not respected during JSON model binding (JSON over-posting vulnerability) #39337
  • Cannot start Docker container on Raspberry Pi 4 using ASP.NET Core 6 #39372
  • Component E2E test failure in Ubuntu #38613
    7.0-preview1
  • 'dotnet watch' add an arg to allow reloading in case of rude edits #37190
    7.0-preview1
  • Hot Reload: allow *always* restart for rude edits #38798
    7.0-preview1
  • AddOption/Service.Configure creating duplicated entries #38569
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39376
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Build ops unquarantining #39374
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for annotating required elements in collection #39367
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Use TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds for clientTimeoutInterval in ClientTime… #39325
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.2
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Switch to Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open #39365
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix CertificateManagerEventSource events 16 and 30 #37625
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #39334
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Switch to Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open #39364
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.2
  • Components E2E test cleanup #39349
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `be7a372` to `e2c62a7` #38755
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.32
  • Avoid declaring RazorPage<T>.Model as nullable by default #39332
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix some fast up to date check issues in VS #32140
    area-infrastructure, retrospective-action
  • Detect HTTP version on invalid HTTP/2 connection #39358
    area-runtime
  • Build ARM64 in main windows build job #38997
    area-runtime
  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix StackLayout parent reset issue #3986

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQLite Database seems to maintain lock on file #27139
  • SqliteDataRecord.GetStream only works with 32-bit keys #27138
  • What collection type should be use for relations to use in domain model #27137

Closed

  • Incorrect optional dependent (owned type) warning when saving optional dependent with the _same_ data #26712
    7.0.0
  • EF Core Migration Bundles: no way to passthrough custom args to generated efbundle #26945
    6.0.2
  • Using EF Core with #27090
  • Do not map annotation to database during migrations #27048
  • With .NET 6, Some Navigation scenario doesn't contain column from Left join in Order By caluse #27114
  • "The entity of type ... does not have any property with a non-default value to identify whether the entity exists" #27111

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the default schema for migration data operations. #27143
  • [release/6.0] Stop prefixing check constraints. #27142
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Remove quirk for #26602 #27140
  • Add overload to SqlServerDbContextOptionsBuilder.EnableRetryOnFailure #27135

Merged

  • Don't issue a warning when replacing an optional dependent with non-null values #27136
  • [release/6.0] Bundles: Allow argument separator (--) #27128
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27141
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27127
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Avoid proxying Clone methods on record types #27125
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Update column expression correctly when lifting joins from group by aggregate subquery #27109
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Lift GroupByAggregate when correlation predicate matches #27108
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • Stop using GetRequired* reflection wrappers to enable trimming #27099
  • [release/6.0] Query: Avoid stackoverflow in lifting group by aggregate term #27131
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Query: Assign proper type to CollectionResultExpression #27134
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
